name: 5/3/1 (Original) — 4-Week Cycle
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 main sets plus optional final AMRAP set (~15-20 min lift focus)
train_to_failure: no, but close on last set
overview_and_execution: Use a training max = 90% of true 1RM. Week1: 65%×5, 75%×5, 85%×5+ (AMRAP). Week2: 70%×3, 80%×3, 90%×3+. Week3: 75%×5, 85%×3, 95%×1+. Week4 is a deload. Then add 5-10 lb to the training max and repeat.
important_notes: Focus on slow, steady progression. Last set can be pushed close to failure for AMRAP. Minimal accessory or a chosen template can be added.
volume_metrics: Main sets each day: 3 sets plus optional additional reps on last set
